TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimeSpanValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來確保物件符合特定準則。The class is used to ensure that a object meets specific criteria. 具有兩個參數的建構函式可確保最少和最多權力值。The constructor with two parameters ensures that both a minimum and a maximum value are adhered to. 的最小值和最大值，具有三個參數的建構函式會檢查值，以及驗證範圍是否獨佔。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 四個參數的建構函式會檢查先前的三個參數，並也檢查是否值相當於特定的秒數。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific number of seconds. 方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當具有兩個參數的建構函式使用時，物件會驗證值符合在特定範圍。When the constructor with two parameters is used, the object validates that a value adheres to a specific range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會檢查的最小值和最大值值，以及驗證範圍是否獨佔。The constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 當`rangeIsExclusive`參數設定為`true`，則值之間不能`minValue`和`maxValue`值。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`resolutionInSeconds`指定參數，物件正在驗證必須等於此值才能通過驗證。When the `resolutionInSeconds` parameter is specified, the object being validated must be equal to this value in order to pass validation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 判斷物件的值是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含的規則需要驗證物件。The object contains the rules necessary to validate a object. 執行個體時，會建立規則建立類別。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator/CS/TimeSpanValidator.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator/VB/TimeSpanValidator.vb#4)]
